title: Pixel 4 xl battery issues - battery usage and % display, and performance issues
content: My battery performs erratically, and battery usage shows strange performance, with %left being strangely stuck on 50%,v 25% or other numbers.  The phone has started to shut down unexpectedly occasionally. Some days battery usage has not been available at all. This has been happening since the May 2020 update - (it have have happened in April, I can't be sure. I typically have the phone off charge all day and leave it on charge overnight (12am - 7am)
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
